title: Healthcare Assistant
description: Assisted patients with daily living activities and supported medical staff in various tasks.
technologies: EHR Systems, Monitoring devices, Mobility and lifting aids
accomplishments: monitored patient conditions and reported to medical staff
assisted with medical procedures and administered medications under supervision
maintained a clean and safe environment, adhering to health and safety regulations
fostered strong connections with residents, their families, and multidisciplinary healthcare teams to ensure coordinated care.
